thread.title: 'Sadio is back!' - Liverpool fans delighted at Mane's AFCON defeat
thread.title_full: 'Sadio is back!' - Liverpool fans delighted at Mane's AFCON defeat

title: 'Sadio is back!' - Liverpool fans delighted at Mane's AFCON defeat
text:
0 29-Jan-2017 05:08:48 Reds supporters were pleased to see Senegal knocked out as it means they will get the attacker back from international duty 
Liverpool fans watched their side suffer a shock defeat on Saturday, but were much happier to see a different team lose on another continent. 
The Reds have been without Sadio Mane since the start of January due to his participation in the Africa Cup of Nations with Senegal, and suffered another disappointing result without the ace as Wolves knocked Jurgen Klopp's side out of the FA Cup. 
Before heading to Gabon, Mane had been in excellent form for his club, and fans expressed their delight on Twitter as Liverpool's official account announced his AFCON exit following the penalty defeat to Cameroon. Commiserations to Sadio Mane, who bows out of #AFCON2017 with Senegal. pic.twitter.com/UzitmsXj9R â€” Liverpool FC (@LFC) January 28, 2017 
Liverpool offered their commiserations, but supporters did not believe they were genuine, and celebrated Senegal's departure from the tournament. @LFC commiserations, yes. But need to get him back to Merseyside. Where's that jet Firmino and Coutinho were being whisked out of Brazil on?
